2073.subject: LL
2073.descrlong: The culminating learning experience in the major requires students to demonstrate depth knowledge and integration and synthesis of their learning across the disciplines through a well-defined research paper and project. Aligns with LS MLOs 1-10.  Remaining units at point of Capstone must be no more than 14 semester units (including the 4 unit capstone). (LL Core class) (Offered every semester.)
